short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces your new tab page with spicy roasts based on your recent browsing history - a unique and fun way to browse every day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your New Tab with a Dash of Humour!

How It Works:
With BrowserBurn, every new tab comes with a personalised roast based on your browsing history. Our AI, trained on a trove of humorous content, crafts each roast to be uniquely entertaining. Just install the extension, and you're ready to laugh at your own internet habits. It’s like having a cheeky friend who’s in on all your online secrets.

Features:
• Instant, Tailored Roasts
• Shareable Laughs
• Light & Dark Mode
• No Sign-Up Needed

Ready to face the truth? Get BrowserBurn now and turn your browsing into a daily dose of fun!

Support Us: Love the roasts? Buy us a coffee https://buymeacoffee.com/browserburn
